text: I love Pancho even though he's been with me for 40 years, he's totally dumb and has no teeth. I don't care if he's completely bald, except between his toes, walking humpy and sometimes falling down the street. When he thinks it necessary to make a short, sharp whistling sound, bite the couch or sleep in the garden, I accept all of that as quite normal. Because I love him. I love Pancho because he's the only man who doesn't care if I have three legs. FIN FIND European anonymous
title: Pancho
author: nan Anónimo
